CIRCULAR NO.  3 / 2008 
 
 
Subject :   In-line Baggage X-Ray Screening System . :reg. 
 
 
In supersession of Bureau Circular No. 15/2007 dated 11.12.2007 
following guidelines are communicated for compliance: - 
 
“In compliance of Ministry of Civil Aviation directions, it has been decided that 
the function of In-Line Baggage X-Ray Screening System  will be carried 
out by the respective airport operators with the personnel certified by Bureau 
of Civil Aviation Security. However, where the airport operator does not 
propose  to carry out this function itself, the work could be assigned to the 
subsidiary companies of National Air Carrier or their  Joint Venture, to be 
carried out through the personnel certified by BCAS.” 
 
 
( M Malaviya,IPS ) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
